questions.a:
Website: thehermeticflight.com

Blog: In-depth articles on tarot divination and aerial arts symbolism

Newsletter: Campaign updates, behind-the-scenes content, early access

Social Media: @thehermeticflight (Instagram, Facebook) for daily card reveals and performer stories

questions.q: How can I support the project before Kickstarter?
questions.a:
Follow us on social media and engage with posts (this helps algorithm visibility)

Share the project with friends interested in tarot or aerial arts

Join our newsletter list (Kickstarter rewards algorithm favor for strong list sizes)

Provide feedback on what stretch goals interest you most

Connect with us in community spaces

Thank you for your interest in The Hermetic Flight Aerial Tarot Deck. We're creating something truly unique for the tarot community, and we're honored you're considering joining us on this journey.

"Between earth and sky, between question and answer, we find our truth in suspension."
